editorialNotes.standard: We love the sugar rush we get from tackling sweet challenges with tough cookies in this deliciously lighthearted action RPG.

editorialNotes.tagline: A fast and frantic battle royale
editorialNotes.standard: Survive the fierce battle for victory.
editorialNotes.short: Survive the fierce battle for victory.

editorialNotes.standard: Years ago, Plants vs. Zombies defined a genre with its fresh concept, undeniable charm and innovative, balanced gameplay. Now the undead have risen again, bringing with them new time-travelling tales and a massive slew of new zombies and plants. Whether you stomp foes without spending any money or you buy new experimental plants and power-ups with In-App Purchases, the result is the same: an incredible sequel that's fresh and fun throughout, reminding us why we fell in love with this world in the first place.

ios.subtitle: Wreak Havoc as the Top Cat!

editorialNotes.standard: It's back! Sprint for the leaderboards in the sequel to one of the App Store's most popular endless runners, which arrives with a host of fabulous improvements, from overhauled graphics to refined controls, original minecart and zip-line challenges, and much more.

editorialNotes.standard: Crack the case of a missing teenager using clues hidden in her phone in this suspenseful mystery.

editorialNotes.short: Hop on the Astral Express and live interplanetary adventures.

ios.subtitle: Luxury Car Buy and Sale Game

editorialNotes.standard: This breathtaking game mixes tycoon-style park management with electrifying dino-on-dino battles, starring characters and critters from the blockbuster film. We love tinkering with our dinosaur DNA to evolve our thunder lizards into more powerful specimens while also expanding our dream park’s high-tech facilities. When it comes time to test your dinosaurs’ mettle in the arena, strength and strategy are the keys to prehistoric pugilist victories. And luckily, the Indominus rex stays inside her cage. For now.

editorialNotes.short: Romance, mystery and home decor - this adventure has it all!

editorialNotes.standard: Don’t know your contrast from your saturation? This app makes photo editing approachable, letting you make adjustments (and save them as presets) with a few taps. It’s a simple but powerful way to freshen up your snaps.

Daredevil. Storm. Juggernaut. Vision. Kabam’s beautiful brawler gives you control of dozens of beloved heroes and villains as you punch, kick and blast your way across the Marvel universe. A simple and intuitive set of attacks, counters and special attacks make for edge-of-your-seat combat, but you’ll spend just as much time finding and upgrading your super-team. Figuring out the best way to use them is key to surviving bouts with relentless opponents—and progressing through treacherous story quests.
Few villains are as unsettling as this stealth game’s creepy neighbour, who relentlessly pursues you through his increasingly bizarre house.

ios.subtitle: Set sail on a new adventure

editorialNotes.standard: No magic? No problem! Recruit heroes as you train to become the Wizard King in this vibrant auto-battling RPG.

DJing requires skill, attention to craft and hours of practice. But this free app can help. It teaches and simplifies the process of audio mixing through a slick, Apple Design Award–winning visual interface.

ios.subtitle: Kill the dead to stop Doomsday

editorialNotes.standard: The LEGO-fied version of The Force Awakens gives us exactly what we want from these games: brick-breaking action, fun puzzles, and lots of goofy humor. It captures the spirit of Episode VII perfectly—super-charged by movie-cast voiceovers and the chance to play through events not shown in the film. You can try the first level for free, but that’s just the start of a magical journey.
